DocAttribute.Name: Axis
DocAttribute.Documentation: Axis about which revolution will take place.

DocAttribute.Name: Angle
DocAttribute.Documentation: The angle through which the sweep will be made. This angle is measured from the plane of the swept area provided by the XY plane of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: AxisLine
DocAttribute.Documentation: The line of the axis of revolution.
DocAttribute.Derived: IfcRepresentationItem() || IfcGeometricRepresentationItem () || IfcCurve() || IfcLine(Axis.Location, IfcRepresentationItem() || IfcGeometricRepresentationItem () || IfcVector(Axis.Z,1.0))

DocWhereRule.Name: AxisStartInXY
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The start of the axis shall lie in the XY plane of the position coordinate system.

DocWhereRule.Name: AxisDirectionInXY
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The direction of the axis shall be parallel to the XY plane of the position coordinate system.
